title: Sugar Bowl, Cover, And Tray, 1956-188-4-a/c, 1900–10
markings:
Saucer: Imperial eagle on green shield and "Made in Russia by Kornilow Bros. for Tiffany and Co., New York."
Cup: No shield and "Made in Russia by Kornilow Bros. for Tiffany and Co., New York."
description: Bulbous bowl with straight short neck and conventionalized horses for handles.  Cover with shaped knob and cut-out for spoon.  Slightly curved saucer. The bowl and saucer have a row of shields with animals on blue field and conventionalized flowers between.
